comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Bronze statue of Anita Garibaldi, Rome See ipsimages.photoshelter.com/image/I0000mhUeEKrecfw and commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:20110327_Roma_Gianicolo_A... The Wikimedia description in English is: Mario Rutelli's bronze statue of Anita Garibaldi (built 1932) on the Gianicolo Hill, Rome. The monument is also Anita Garibaldi's grave as her ashes rest in the statue's pedestal
